3: While Babylonia is falling...
—Somewhere in the universe is a once bustling town. Now devoid of any occupants, the buildings and houses have become nothing but concrete and rebar gravestones.
Only the occasional red streams can be seen coursing around the crystalline pillars.
And between the pillars, three figures—one tiny, two big—are strolling through the town without a care in the world.
Booooring! Boring boring, it's so boring! Martin, come up with something fun!
Stop being such a child, Nanami.
Nyehh! I knew I couldn't count on you! Rohacchi, tell me a new explorer unit joke!
No. More. All. Hundred. Used up. In one day.
Nanami turns to squint at the two mechanoids.
... (Glares)
...What is it?
Rohacchi. Does not. Get it.
Can't you two just, act a little happier?
You dragged us all the way here... without a single explanation...
Nanami. Wants. Rohacchi. To go. Then. Rohacchi. Goes.
I told you already! We're playing a game! And the game is about going on a journey!
And what's a journey without companions?! That's why you both are here!
Never heard of that before...
Nanami. Where. Are. You. Bringing. Rohacchi?
Let's see... there's this nagging mecha babushka... You know, the kind that lives in outer space...
And this mecha babushka wants to talk with Nanami, but Nanami's voice isn't loud enough...
So it gave me some coordinates to a loudspeaker that can send Nanami's voice to the heavens!
But since it'll be bor... Ahem, I mean, dangerous on the road, I got my two amigos here to protect me!
That. Is. Just. How. She. Is.
